subject: My Dear,
body:
My Dear,
I am very happy to inform you about my success in getting those funds
under my Banks. I want you to contact William Donna  on his private
email and ask him to send you the total sum of ($10.800.000.00) ATM
CARD, which I kept for your compensation. Therefore feel free and
contact him immediately
Name: William Donna
E-Mail: 
williamdonna1n@gmail.com
Amount: $10.800,000.00 United States Dollars
Your payment reference code Number ADK/ATM/0041/23
1.Your full name.
2.Your home address.
3.Your current home telephone number/mobile phone number.
Best regards,
Dr. Johnson Mark

subject: Re:   My Dear,
body:
Hello Dr. Johnson Mark,

I'm thrilled to hear about your success! It's always great to see hard work paying off. I'm curious about this ATM CARD you mentioned. Could you tell me more about it? What is its purpose and how does it work?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Brett

William Donna
